Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to acquire a product that is worth $12,000 to me, but tailored specifically to meet your requirements at a more accessible cost. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
